beer.beer_description:
Apparently, there are two sides to every argument. But when our five brewers got together to debate their favourite hops, not surprisingly, there were five sides. Not quite a cube, but almost. 

So rather than take sides, we were distinctly diplomatic and decided to create a brew that combined them all. 

Striking a balance that brought out the best characteristics of each hop, without compromising the others was about the toughest thing we’ve ever done. 

But finally, everything lined up perfectly, to create this beautifully balanced, highly hoppy, strong pale ale. 

What’s in it? Just real beer ingredients and five amazing hops for our ‘fantastic five’ brewers. Galaxy (punchy Benny), El Dorado (sweet Mike), Citra (smoooooth Sean), Mosaic (complex Kieron), Belma (tropical Hawaiian Brennan).

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 10! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 410 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 83!

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 375 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 76!

items.checkin_comment: I probably shouldn’t be drinking beer past it’s use by date.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 15 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 4!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 165 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 34.

items.checkin_comment: Label says Session IPA but tastes more like the style guide of normal Pale Ale It’s missing the tangy IPA taste yet still drinkable

items.comment: My eyes aren't that good but I guess that bottle in the distance is a beer.
Your eyes are still focussing That’s good. Once you have another couple of beers they might not😁😁

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 110 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 23!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 130 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 27!

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 185 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 38.
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 30 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 7.
